rules.note: Files matching project keywords route to project folder
Everything else stays in RileyShare for Claude to organize

file_routing.naming_convention: aiBrief_ThursFeb12 format for briefs. Captures: capture-YYYY-MM-DD-HHMMSS.txt

preferences.design: Clean, minimal, non-generic. Discerning aesthetic eye. Better Notes style UI.
preferences.formatting: No excessive bullets/indents. Hashtags over folders. Context over structure.
preferences.workflow: Multi-channel dumper. Speed over organization at capture. AI organizes later.
preferences.hardware: iMac (Xeon W, Sequoia 15.7.3 max), MacBook Air, iPhone 17 Pro Max, Apple Watch Ultra 3

riley_context.communication_style: Direct, efficient. Task execution over conversation. No filler, no praise, no health advice.

claude.note: All terminal activity is Claude-initiated via Cowork. Riley does not use terminal directly.
